title: BRIEF-Ppk Group Says To Acquire 45% Of Shares In Craig International Ballistics
text:
BRIEF-Ppk Group Says To Acquire 45% Of Shares In Craig International Ballistics

Stock Markets 35 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 10:56)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Ppk Group Says To Acquire 45% Of Shares In Craig International Ballistics Oct 28 (Reuters) - PPK Group Ltd : * ENTERED INTO BINDING MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING TO ACQUIRE 45% OF SHARES IN CRAIG INTERNATIONAL BALLISTICS PTY LTD * WILL ISSUE 500,000 SHARES IN PPK AT $4.50 PER SHARE & A CASH PAYMENT OF $2.75 MILLION, FOR A TOTAL CONSIDERATION OF $5 MILLION

BRIEF-Ppk Group Says To Acquire 45% Of Shares In Craig International Ballistics
description: BRIEF-Ppk Group Says To Acquire 45% Of Shares In Craig International Ballistics
